verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. also came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch in the midst בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- house הַמֶּ֖רִי <WH4805> ham-Me-ri of a rebellious אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you יֹשֵׁ֑ב <WH3427> yo-Shev; thou dwellest אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who עֵינַיִם֩ <WH5869> 'ei-na-Yim which have eyes לָהֶ֨ם la-Hem לִרְא֜וֹת <WH7200> lir-'ot to see וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not רָא֗וּ <WH7200> ra-'U, and see אָזְנַ֨יִם <WH241> 'a-ze-Na-yim not they have ears לָהֶ֤ם la-Hem לִשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> lish-Mo-a' to hear וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not שָׁמֵ֔עוּ <WH8085> sha-Me-'u, and hear כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki for בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit house מְרִ֖י <WH4805> me-Ri not for they [are] a rebellious הֵֽם׃ <WH1992> Hem. like

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- Therefore thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man עֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH6213> 'a-Seh prepare לְךָ֙ le-Cha כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> ke-Lei thee stuff גוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> go-Lah, for removing וּגְלֵ֥ה <WH1540> u-ge-Leh and remove יוֹמָ֖ם <WH3119> yo-Mam by day לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5869> le-'ei-nei-Hem; in their sight וְגָלִ֨יתָ <WH1540> ve-ga-Li-ta and thou shalt remove מִמְּקוֹמְךָ֜ <WH4725> mi-me-kom-Cha from thy place אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about מָק֤וֹם <WH4725> ma-Kom place אַחֵר֙ <WH312> 'a-Cher to another לְעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5869> le-'Ei-nei-Hem, in their sight אוּלַ֣י <WH194> 'u-Lai Perhaps יִרְא֔וּ <WH7200> yir-'U, it may be they will consider כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki though בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit house מְרִ֖י <WH4805> me-Ri though they [be] a rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> Hem-mah. like

וְהוֹצֵאתָ֨ <WH3318> ve-ho-tze-Ta Then shalt thou bring forth כֵלֶ֜יךָ <WH3627> che-Lei-cha thy stuff כִּכְלֵ֥י <WH3627> kich-Lei as stuff גוֹלָ֛ה <WH1473> go-Lah for removing יוֹמָ֖ם <WH3119> yo-Mam by day לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5869> le-'ei-nei-Hem; in their sight וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah, you תֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> te-Tze and thou shalt go forth בָעֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH6153> va-'E-rev at even לְעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5869> le-'Ei-nei-Hem, in their sight כְּמוֹצָאֵ֖י <WH4161> ke-mo-tza-'Ei as they that go forth גּוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1473> go-Lah. into captivity

לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5869> le-'ei-nei-Hem in their sight חֲתָר־ <WH2864> cha-tor- Dig לְךָ֣ le-Cha בַקִּ֑יר <WH7023> vak-Kir; thou through the wall וְהוֹצֵאתָ֖ <WH3318> ve-ho-tze-Ta and carry out בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

לְעֵ֨ינֵיהֶ֜ם <WH5869> le-'Ei-nei-Hem In their sight עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above כָּתֵ֤ף <WH3802> ka-Tef [it] upon [thy] shoulders תִּשָּׂא֙ <WH5375> tis-Sa shalt thou bear בָּעֲלָטָ֣ה <WH5939> ba-'a-la-Tah in the twilight תוֹצִ֔יא <WH3318> to-Tzi, [and] carry [it] forth פָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha thy face תְכַסֶּ֔ה <WH3680> te-chas-Seh, thou shalt cover וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo you cannot תִרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> tir-'Eh that thou see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; not the ground כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- as מוֹפֵ֥ת <WH4159> mo-Fet thee [for] a sign נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> ne-tat-Ti-cha for I have set לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> le-Veit unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וָאַ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> va-'A-'as And I did כֵּן֮ <WH3651> ken so כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher I צֻוֵּיתִי֒ <WH6680> tzuv-vei-Ti so as I was commanded כֵּ֠לַי <WH3627> Ke-lai my stuff הוֹצֵ֜אתִי <WH3318> ho-Tze-ti I brought forth כִּכְלֵ֤י <WH3627> kich-Lei as stuff גוֹלָה֙ <WH1473> go-Lah for captivity יוֹמָ֔ם <WH3119> yo-Mam, by day וּבָעֶ֛רֶב <WH6153> u-va-'E-rev and in the even חָתַֽרְתִּי־ <WH2864> cha-tar-ti- I digged לִ֥י li בַקִּ֖יר <WH7023> vak-Kir through the wall בְּיָ֑ד <WH3027> be-Yad; with mine hand בָּעֲלָטָ֥ה <WH5939> ba-'a-la-Tah in the twilight הוֹצֵ֛אתִי <WH3318> ho-Tze-ti I brought [it] forth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above כָּתֵ֥ף <WH3802> ka-Tef [it] upon [my] shoulder נָשָׂ֖אתִי <WH5375> na-Sa-ti [and] I bare לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> le-'ei-nei-Hem. in their sight פ Peh

וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- came the word יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֖י <WH413> 'e-Lai in בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> bab-Bo-ker And in the morning לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man הֲלֹ֨א <WH3808> ha-Lo not אָמְר֥וּ <WH559> 'a-me-Ru said אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha has not בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit hath not the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit house הַמֶּ֑רִי <WH4805> ham-Me-ri; the rebellious מָ֖ה <WH4100> mah What אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah What עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> 'o-Seh. unto thee What doest

אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> 'e-Mor Say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem, to כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar thou unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהֹוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD הַנָּשִׂ֞יא <WH5387> han-na-Si [concerneth] the prince הַמַּשָּׂ֤א <WH4853> ham-mas-Sa This burden הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> haz-Zeh This בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> bi-Ru-sha-Lam, in Jerusalem וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah like בְתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> ve-to-Cham. that [are] among

אֱמֹ֖ר <WH559> 'e-Mor Say אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am מֽוֹפֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH4159> mo-fet-Chem; I [am] your sign כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher to you עָשִׂ֗יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti, like as I have done כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> ken so יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> ye-'a-Seh so shall it be done לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, בַּגּוֹלָ֥ה <WH1473> bag-go-Lah unto them they shall remove בַשְּׁבִ֖י <WH7628> vash-she-Vi into captivity יֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> ye-Le-chu. will go

וְהַנָּשִׂ֨יא <WH5387> ve-han-na-Si And the prince אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בְּתוֹכָ֜ם <WH8432> be-to-Cham that [is] among אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כָּתֵ֤ף <WH3802> ka-Tef upon [his] shoulder יִשָּׂא֙ <WH5375> yis-Sa them shall bear בָּעֲלָטָ֣ה <WH5939> ba-'a-la-Tah in the twilight וְיֵצֵ֔א <WH3318> ve-ye-Tze, and shall go forth בַּקִּ֥יר <WH7023> bak-Kir through the wall יַחְתְּר֖וּ <WH2864> yach-te-Ru they shall dig לְה֣וֹצִיא <WH3318> le-Ho-tzi to carry out ב֑וֹ vo; פָּנָ֣יו <WH6440> pa-Nav his face יְכַסֶּ֔ה <WH3680> ye-chas-Seh, thereby he shall cover יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an, that אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not יִרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> yir-'Eh he see לַעַ֛יִן <WH5869> la-'A-yin with [his] eyes ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. not the ground

וּפָרַשְׂתִּ֤י <WH6566> u-fa-ras-Ti also will I spread אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רִשְׁתִּי֙ <WH7568> rish-Ti My net עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav, over וְנִתְפַּ֖שׂ <WH8610> ve-nit-Pas upon him and he shall be taken בִּמְצֽוּדָתִ֑י <WH4686> bim-tzu-da-Ti; in my snare וְהֵבֵאתִ֨י <WH935> ve-he-ve-Ti and I will bring אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> o-To בָבֶ֙לָה֙ <WH894> va-Ve-lah him to Babylon אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz [to] the land כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> kas-Dim, of the Chaldeans וְאוֹתָ֥הּ <WH853> ve-'o-Tah לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- he will not יִרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> yir-'Eh yet shall he not see וְשָׁ֥ם <WH8033> ve-Sham there יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> ya-Mut. it though he shall die

וְכֹל֩ <WH3605> ve-Chol to every אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who סְבִיבֹתָ֥יו <WH5439> se-vi-vo-Tav all that [are] about; עֶזְרֹה 'ez-roh כעֶזְרֹ֛ו <WH5828> 'ez-Ro help קוְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all אֲגַפָּ֖יו <WH102> 'a-gap-Pav him and all his bands אֱזָרֶ֣ה <WH2219> 'e-za-Reh And I will scatter לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol and all ר֑וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach; toward every wind וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ve-Che-rev the sword אָרִ֥יק <WH7324> 'a-Rik and I will draw out אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem. after

וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U And they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; that I [am] the LORD בַּהֲפִיצִ֤י <WH6327> ba-ha-fi-Tzi when I shall scatter אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> o-Tam בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> bag-go-Yim, them among the nations וְזֵרִיתִ֥י <WH2219> ve-ze-ri-Ti and disperse אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> o-Tam בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> ba-'a-ra-Tzot. them in the countries

וְהוֹתַרְתִּ֤י <WH3498> ve-ho-tar-Ti But I will leave מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> me-Hem like אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> 'an-Shei a מִסְפָּ֔ר <WH4557> mis-Par, a few מֵחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> me-Che-rev of them from the sword מֵרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> me-ra-'Av from the famine וּמִדָּ֑בֶר <WH1698> u-mid-Da-ver; and from the pestilence לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because of יְסַפְּר֜וּ <WH5608> ye-sap-pe-Ru that they may declare אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all תּוֹעֲבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH8441> to-'a-vo-tei-Hem, all their abominations בַּגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> bag-go-Yim among the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- they בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u whither they come שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, in it וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD פ Peh
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came to me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man לַחְמְךָ֖ <WH3899> lach-me-Cha thy bread בְּרַ֣עַשׁ <WH7494> be-Ra-'ash with quaking תֹּאכֵ֑ל <WH398> to-Chel; eat וּמֵימֶ֕יךָ <WH4325> u-mei-Mei-cha thy water בְּרָגְזָ֥ה <WH7269> be-ra-ge-Zah with trembling וּבִדְאָגָ֖ה <WH1674> u-vid-'a-Gah and with carefulness תִּשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> tish-Teh. and drink

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta And say אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to עַ֣ם <WH5971> 'am unto the people הָאָ֡רֶץ <WH127> ha-'A-retz of the land כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַר֩ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֨י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֜ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD לְיוֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> le-yo-she-Vei of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- of אַדְמַ֣ת <WH776> 'ad-Mat [and] of the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לַחְמָם֙ <WH3899> lach-Mam their bread בִּדְאָגָ֣ה <WH1674> bid-'a-Gah with carefulness יֹאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> yo-Che-lu, They shall eat וּמֵֽימֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4325> u-mei-mei-Hem their water בְּשִׁמָּמ֣וֹן <WH8078> be-shim-ma-Mon with astonishment יִשְׁתּ֑וּ <WH8354> yish-Tu; and drink לְמַ֜עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because תֵּשַׁ֤ם <WH3456> te-Sham may be desolate אַרְצָהּ֙ <WH776> 'ar-Tzah that her land מִמְּלֹאָ֔הּ <WH4393> mi-me-lo-'Ah, from all that is therein מֵחֲמַ֖ס <WH2555> me-cha-Mas because of the violence כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- of all הַיֹּשְׁבִ֥ים <WH3427> hai-yo-she-Vim of all them that dwell בָּֽהּ׃ <WH99999> Bah.

וְהֶעָרִ֤ים <WH5892> ve-he-'a-Rim And the cities הַנּֽוֹשָׁבוֹת֙ <WH3427> han-no-sha-Vot that are inhabited תֶּחֱרַ֔בְנָה <WH2717> te-che-Rav-nah, shall be laid waste וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ve-ha-'A-retz and the land שְׁמָמָ֣ה <WH8077> she-ma-Mah shall be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh; become וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD פ Peh
